medical_history.chief_complaint: The patient is a 6-year-old male of short stature presenting with clinical characteristics associated with Aarskog-Scott syndrome.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient was first seen in 2019. His general state of health is good with regular psychomotor development. There is no indication of symptom progression or changes over time.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Negative for congenital heart defects, neurocognitive disabilities, ocular problems, food or drug allergies.
